name: Fever 2: Sankyo Koushiki Pachinko Simulation
overview: Fever 2: Sankyo Koushiki Pachinko Simulation is the second game in the pachinko gambling series released by ICS for the Playstation one console and is a gambling game that features the 3 different versions of the pachinko gambling machine CR Fever ghost (CR Fever ghost SP, GP & DX). The game also features a story mode in which the player can choose between a male or a female gambler that will go around pachinko places to win prizes.
